awd_titl_txt: Conference: Multiple Conferences to be held at Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory in 2015
awd_abstract_narration:
This award will support attendance by early-career scientists to seven conferences to be held in 2015 at Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory, including:  Systems Biology: Networks; Wiring the Brain; the Annual CSHL Symposium: 21st Century Genetics; Eukaryotic mRNA Processing; Mechanisms of Eukaryotic Transcription; Cell Biology of Yeast; and Plant Genomes & Biotechnology.  Each conference will include presentations by junior and senior investigators in a format designed to promote scientific exchange in both formal and informal settings. Results from the conferences will be disseminated via distribution of abstract books and via the CSHL Leading Strand video archive.

Each conference will address a variety of up-to-date, cutting edge topics relevant to each field of research, with emphasis on fostering cross-disciplinary and forward-looking discussions and co0llaborations. 

Co-funded by the following programs in the Directorate of Biological Sciences:  Genetic Mechanisms, Cellular Dynamics and Function, and Systems and Synthetic Biology in the Division of Molecular and Cellular Bioscience; and Neural Systems Organization and Plant Genome Research Program in the Division of Integrative Organismal Systems.
org_div_long_name: Division of Molecular and Cellular Biosciences

Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Conference on

Systems Biology: Networks

March 17 – 21, 2015

Organized by:

Pascal Braun, Technische Universität München, DE

Suzanne Gaudet, Dana-Farber Cancer Institute, US

Ben Lehner, Center for Genomic Regulation, ES

Chad Myers, University of Minnesota, US

 143 Participants

 

 

Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Conference on

Wiring the Brain

March 24-28, 2015

 Organized by:

Kevin Mitchell, Trinity College Dublin, Ireland

Josh Huang, Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory

Helen Mayberg, Emory University

 

Participants: 180

 

Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Conference on

80th Symposium: 21st Century Genetics: Genes at Work

May 26 – May 31, 2015

 ORGANIZED BY:

David Stewart, Terri Grodzicker and Bruce Stillman

Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory

 346 Participants

 

Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Conference on

Eukaryotic mRNA Processing

August 18 – 22, 2015

 Organized by:

Jean Beggs, University of Edinburgh, United Kingdom

Jens Lykke-Andersen, University of California, San Diego

Kristen Lynch, University of Pennsylvania

 316 Participants

 

Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Conference on

Mechanisms of Eukaryotic Transmission

August 25-29, 2015

 Organized by:

Patrick Cramer, Max Planck Institute of Biophysical Chemistry, Germany

Katherine A. Jones, The Salk Institute for Biological Studies

John Lis, Cornell University

 314 Participants

 

 

Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Conference on

Cell Biology of Yeasts

November 3 – 7, 2015

 

ORGANIZED BY:

Martha Cyert, Stanford University

Daniel Lew, Duke University Medical Center

Kenneth Sawin, University of Edinburgh, UK

 142 Participants

 

Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Conference on

Plant Genomes & Development: From Genes to Networks

December 2 – 5, 2015

 

Organized by:

Todd Mockler, Donald Danforth Plants Science Center

Jane Parker, Max-Planck Inst...
